A cry for a right improvement of all our mercies, and all those vvorks of wonder that God hath wrought among us: VVith some cautions touching the election of the (expected) new representative. Humbly presented by a friend to the publique. Friend to the publique.
12 p.
Printed for Tho. Brewster, and Greg: Moule, and are to be sold at the three Bibles in Pauls Church-yard, at the West-end thereof, London : MDCLII. [1652 i.e. 1651]
Date of publication from Thomason Collection. Annotation on Thomason copy: "October: 22.". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
